name: RunningMan (ChrisCast13)
description:
Think of this game like a Super Meat Boy / Demon Souls spinoff. As you progress, the levels get a little trickier. From the first level, you start out with 5 lives and the time you're at the last level you only have 3 lives to spare. Similar to Demon Souls, there are no save points or re-spawn locations. Once you die, you start all over. Use your special double jump power to traverse and learn as you continue on. 

-Movement Configuration: W, A, S, D.

-Double Jump: Double click left mouse button. 

-Borrowed art from BayatGames (Unity Asset Store)
